casebody.data:
The BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON f/k/a The Bank of New York, etc., Plaintiff,
v.
Sarah G. LAKS and Edward Einhorn, Defendants-Movants,
and
PNC Bank National Association, and State of New Jersey, Defendants. M-73 September Term 2018
080805 Supreme Court of New Jersey. September 24, 2018

ORDER

It is ORDERED that the motion for reconsideration of the Court's order denying the petition for certification is denied.
